alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 5:44AM AKST until January 22 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. South winds gusting to 30 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow with visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...near Brooks Range Passes * WHEN...Until 6 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds gusting to 30 mph are causing areas of blowing and drifting snow with visibility one half mile or less at times. Large snow drifts will form. Winds will decrease this evening and conditions will improve then. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
